* Desmonus simply walked along with Bloodystrike and Reptilica, actually 
taking in their body heat to warm her own body.
She could literally hear Reptilica�s spark speed up as she leaned against 
him, not caring whether he was excited but that his mech-fluid was now 
speeding through his body at an even faster rate.
But she felt Bloodystrike come up closer beside her and she tightened her 
grip on his arm, but she was in no mood for pleasantries and only really 
wanted to rest. Indeed she was hungry and may take a meal but there would be 
no love making any time soon.
She just wanted to be fed.
Desmonus turned the corner with Reptilica, feeling his tug but simply 
tugging back, an obvious sign not to be so hasty and to take his time. She 
wasn�t going anywhere.
She smiled up at him, then at Bloodystrike.*

� That sounds wonderful, I could use a rest�and I�m sure you two could use 
one as well.�

* Yes�a rest in order to build up their mech-fluid levels again once she had 
taken a bite or two�*
